text: Cyclamides are a class of oligopeptides, produced by cyanobacteria algae strains, such as microcystis aeruginosa and can be toxic. Cyclamides are synthesized through ribosomic pathways. ==See also== *Cyanopeptolin *Microcystin ==References== ==External links== * Cyanobacteria, and toxin production (The New York Times) Category:Peptides Category:Cyanotoxins
title: Cyclamide
